oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Thomas Smith Harvey letter, January 26, 1864
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Thomas Smith Harvey
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter from Thomas Smith Harvey, Camp Near Knoxville, Tenn, to 'Dear Aunt.' Jan. 26, 1864. 3 pp. On color letterhead "The War for the Union."
